meta.description: Evocative visual phrases for 95 commodities - merged and expanded vocabulary

brent.name: Brent Crude
vibes: North Sea platform silhouette against grey dawn
offshore derrick flame stack piercing fog
roughneck crew change on windswept deck
pipeline valve station on Scottish coast
tanker convoy through choppy Atlantic waters
control room monitors glowing with flow data
storage tank farm at Sullom Voe terminal
crude oil stream cascading into separator
platform supply vessel battling North Sea swell
flare boom burning excess gas against storm clouds
maintenance diver descending to subsea infrastructure

vibes: Permian Basin pumpjack nodding at sunset

drilling rig towering over prairie grass
roughneck adjusting pipe on derrick floor
oil train snaking through desert canyon
refinery towers glowing at Baytown dusk
pump station humming in Midland heat
lease operator checking production meters dawn

vibes: blue flame dancing on industrial burner
